titleStmt.title: An Act for appointing commissioners for bringing in the arrears of the revenue due to the Commonwealth
Public General Acts. 1659-05-26
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Passed the 26th of May 1659.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
